message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $120 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget, I can't go beyond $140 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
